name: Mech Dimensions
description:
A Metroidvania with a unique time-looping mechanic. Journey across dimensions, and adapt your mech to suit each climate.

_________________________

Controls:

A + D : Left and Right

Enter : Shoot

Space : Jump

Q + E : Warm or Cool

_________________________

Ben - Programmer, Producer, Tech Artist, Systems Designer, Professional Crunching MAD LAD
